[[div class="parapost"]]
##red|**(account deleted)**## 09/20/09 (Sun) 22:03:32 #12734582
------

Ever since I brought that mirror back home, I've always been catching glimpses of that heart-wrenching figure within its reflections. You might attribute this to environmental quirks, or dismiss it as  another abnormality among the many. But all I want is to share these experiences with you, as a small story of mundane love and unusual dreams. Thank you, strangers.

In my youth, we shared countless sweet moments. Every morning, my heart swelled with warmth and joy. As the sun dipped low, we'd walk hand in hand through the park, basking in the companionship and happiness of that moment. She was my strength in times of despair, a constant reminder that happiness was never far away.

On a starry night, we sat on a campus bench, quietly gazing into each other's eyes. Looking into her earnest gaze, I suddenly realized that she was the right person in my life. I took her hand gently and spoke from the bottom of my heart: "No matter what lies ahead, I promise to stay by your side, forever." She looked at me, her eyes brimming with tears and gratitude: "And I will always be with you, my love, forever." We embraced tightly, as if to freeze that moment eternally, leaving only our true love to endure.

[[/div]]

Iam sorry, my words fail me, butâ€”

My beloved, she... she truly is the miracle of my heart, a dream woven from the spectrum of a rainbow, dancing gracefully on the edge of reality and fantasy.

Every time I gaze into her eyes, it's as if I've tumbled into a boundless, wondrous world, a place of golden wheat fields and a cerulean sky, where ancient tales and untold secrets reside. Her voice is like the wind of that world, caressing my soul, bringing with it the breath of life and the flutter of the unknown.

She left, without looking back, leaving nothing behind. She leaves me alone in the world of the living.

At that time... it was her and me.

Perhaps I was just tired, to the point where I could no longer distinguish between dreams and reality. Are those fragments of dreams falling into reality, or reality piercing into dreams? I donâ€™t know.

The only thing that comforts me is that every time I look at this mirror, it brings back those beautiful memories, and her... enchanting eyes.
